Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Hook (Dogmersfield), Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire is within the vicinity of Odiham Castle and Fleet Pond. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of West Green House Garden and North Hants Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 133 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Satellite programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and an indoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Hook (Dogmersfield), Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire is within the vicinity of Odiham Castle and Fleet Pond. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of West Green House Garden and North Hants Golf Club.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Odiham Castle - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi
Fleet Pond - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
West Green House Garden - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
North Hants Golf Club - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Farnham Castle - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Museum of Farnham - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
St Andrew's Church - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
New Ashgate Gallery - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Birdworld - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Royal Army Physical Training Corps Museum - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
St Marys Church - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Yateley Common Country Park - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Farnborough Air Sciences Trust Museum - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi
Kingsmead Shopping Centre - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Alice Holt Forest - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi

The preferred airport for Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire is London (LHR-Heathrow) - 38.7 km / 24.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
